trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> panels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a orientação horizontal ou vertical dos painéis do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="Vertical" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> from vertical to horizontal or from horizontal to vertical.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> propriedade para alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> de vertical para horizontal ou de horizontal para a vertical.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a horizontal splitter whose top and bottom panels contain <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra um separador horizontal cujo principais e painéis inferior contenham <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controles.

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a horizontal splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: Outras propriedades básicas de um separador horizontal também são mostradas.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interior spacing, in pixels, between the edges of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> and its contents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaçamento interno, em pixels, entre as bordas de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel" /> e o seu conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the interior spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto do tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa o espaçamento interior.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the left or top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />, depending on <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o painel esquerdo ou superior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />, dependendo da <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Vertical" />, the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> é <see langword="Vertical" />, o painel esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Horizontal" />, the top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> é <see langword="Horizontal" />, o painel superior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> property to configure the left panel of a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> or the top panel of a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> propriedade para configurar o painel esquerdo do vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> ou o painel superior de um horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify the minimum size of the panel by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> property, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> property to `Panel1` so that the panel remains the same size when the container is resized, or you can get or set the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode especificar o tamanho mínimo do painel, alterando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> propriedade, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> propriedade `Panel1` para que o painel permanece o mesmo tamanho quando o contêiner é redimensionado ou você pode obter ou definir o painel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível remover <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> não contém nenhum controle que possa receber o foco, permanece o foco no separador quando ele for clicado.

trans-unit.source: To change the focus to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> to 0 and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> to 1.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o foco para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> como 0 e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> como 1.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> não contém nenhum controle que possa receber o foco, permanece o foco no separador quando ele for clicado.

trans-unit.source: To change the focus to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> to 0 and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> to 1.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o foco para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> como 0 e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> como 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining whether <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> está recolhido ou expandido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> recolhido; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left or top edge of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância mínima, em pixels, do separador da borda esquerda ou superior do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left or top edge of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que representa a distância mínima, em pixels, do separador da borda esquerda ou superior do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 25 pixels, regardless of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 25 pixels, independentemente do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> property to prevent the splitter from moving too close to the left or top edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> propriedade para impedir que o separador de perto demais mover para a borda esquerda ou superior do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to prevent some of the display area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> from being covered.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, talvez você queira evitar alguns da área de exibição de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> de abordados.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Vertical` (the default), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> é de propriedade `Vertical` (o padrão), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> retorna a distância mínima de pixels do separador da borda esquerda da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> é de propriedade `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> retorna a distância mínima de pixels do separador da borda superior da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a vertical splitter where the minimum size of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> (the left panel) is set to 30 pixels, which is now the minimum distance the splitter can be from the left edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra uma divisão vertical em que o tamanho mínimo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> (no painel esquerdo) é definido como 30 pixels, que agora é a distância mínima que pode ser o divisor da borda esquerda do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: Outras propriedades básicas de uma divisão vertical também são mostradas.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é incompatível com a orientação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the right or bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />, depending on <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o painel inferior ou direito do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />, dependendo do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Vertical" />, the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> for <see langword="Vertical" />, o painel direito do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Horizontal" />, the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> for <see langword="Horizontal" />, o painel inferior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> property to configure the right panel of a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> or the bottom panel of a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> propriedade para configurar o painel à direita de um vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> ou no painel inferior de um horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify the minimum size of the panel by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> property, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> property to `Panel2` so that the panel remains the same size when the container is resized, or you can get or set the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode especificar o tamanho mínimo do painel, alterando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> propriedade, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> propriedade `Panel2` para que o painel permanece o mesmo tamanho quando o contêiner é redimensionado ou você pode obter ou definir o painel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível remover <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> não contém nenhum controle que possa receber o foco, permanece o foco no separador quando ele for clicado.

trans-unit.source: To change the focus to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> to 0 and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> to 1.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar o foco para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> como 0 e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> como 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining whether <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" /> is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" /> está recolhido ou expandido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" /> recolhido; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the right or bottom edge of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a distância mínima, em pixels, do separador da borda direita ou inferior do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the right or bottom edge of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que representa a distância mínima, em pixels, do separador da borda direita ou inferior do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 25 pixels, regardless of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 25 pixels, independentemente do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> property to prevent the splitter from moving too close to the right or bottom edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> propriedade para impedir que o separador de perto demais mover para a borda inferior ou direita do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to prevent some of the display area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> from being covered.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, talvez você queira evitar alguns da área de exibição de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> de abordados.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Vertical` (the default), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> returns the minimum distance in pixels that the splitter can be from the right edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> é de propriedade `Vertical` (o padrão), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> retorna a distância mínima em pixels que o divisor pode ser da borda direita da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> returns the minimum distance in pixels that the splitter can be from the bottom edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> é de propriedade `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> retorna a distância mínima em pixels que o divisor pode ser da borda inferior da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a vertical splitter where the minimum size of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> (the right panel) is set to 20 pixels, which is now the minimum distance the splitter can be from the right edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra uma divisão vertical em que o tamanho mínimo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> (painel direito) é definido como 20 pixels, que agora é a distância mínima que pode ser o divisor da borda direita do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: Outras propriedades básicas de uma divisão vertical também são mostradas.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é incompatível com a orientação.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> que representa a chave a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a chave foi processada pelo controle; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box key characters, such as TAB, LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW, UP ARROW, and DOWN ARROW.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para lidar com caracteres chave do diálogo caixa, como guia, seta para a esquerda, seta para a direita, seta para cima e seta para baixo.

trans-unit.source: Keys that include the ALT or CONTROL modifiers are not handled.
trans-unit.target: Chaves que incluem os modificadores ALT ou controle não são controladas.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado somente se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método indica que o controle não está processando a chave.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> simplesmente envia o caractere para o pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método ou retorna `false` se o controle não tem nenhum pai.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> classe substitui esse método para executar o processamento real das chaves da caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The run time calls this method only when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução chama esse método somente quando o controle é hospedado em um aplicativo Windows Forms ou como um controle ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: para todas as janelas de herança de classes para chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> método em uma classe derivada, um controle deve retornar <see langword="true" /> para indicar que ele processou a chave.

trans-unit.source: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" /> method should be returned.
trans-unit.target: Para chaves que não são processadas pelo controle, o resultado de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" /> método deve ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: Controles raramente, ou nunca, precisará substituir este método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cycle forward through the controls in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para percorrer os controles no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl" />. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Selects the next available control and makes it the active control.
trans-unit.target: Seleciona o próximo controle disponível e faz dele o controle ativo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a control is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se um controle estiver selecionado. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> controls the tab focus order in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> Controla a ordem de foco do guia da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: From the first control outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to the first control on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro controle fora do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> como o primeiro controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.

trans-unit.source: All controls on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os controles no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The splitter (so that the user can use the arrow keys to move the splitter).
trans-unit.target: O divisor (de forma que o usuário pode usar as teclas de direção para mover o divisor).

trans-unit.source: All controls on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os controles no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The second control outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> that is next in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: O segundo controle fora de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> que vem a seguir na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: O fator pelo qual a altura e a largura do controle serão dimensionadas.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> que especifica os limites do controle para usar ao definir seu tamanho e posição.

trans-unit.source: Scales the location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona o local, o tamanho, o preenchimento e a margem.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para especificar a direção do controle a ser selecionado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move forward in the tab order; <see langword="false" /> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para avançar na ordem de tabulação; <see langword="false" /> para voltar na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: Ativa um controle filho.

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, especifica a direção na ordem de tabulação da qual selecionar o controle.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height" /> do controle.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the specified bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: Executa o trabalho de configurar os limites especificados desse controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the splitter, in pixels, from the left or top edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o local do divisor, em pixels, da borda esquerda ou superior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the location of the splitter, in pixels, from the left or top edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que representa o local do divisor, em pixels, da borda esquerda ou superior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 50 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 50 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> property to determine or specify the distance in pixels of the splitter from the left or top edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> propriedade para determinar ou especificar a distância em pixels do separador da borda esquerda ou superior do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: You can both specify an initial distance and change the distance at design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: Você pode tanto especificar uma distância inicial e alterar a distância em tempo de design ou tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> is `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> is calculated in pixels from the top edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> é `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> é calculado em pixels da borda superior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> is `Vertical`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> is calculated in pixels from the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> é `Vertical`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> é calculado em pixels da borda esquerda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies that the initial distance of the vertical splitter from the left edge of the container is 79 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir especifica que a distância inicial do separador vertical da borda esquerda do contêiner é 79 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: Outras propriedades básicas de uma divisão vertical também são mostradas.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O valor é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: The value is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: O valor é incompatível com a orientação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the increment of splitter movement in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa o incremento de movimentação de divisor em pixels.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the increment of splitter movement in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que representa o incremento de movimentação de separador em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The default value is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é um pixel.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A> property to create a snapping splitter that moves in larger increments than one pixel.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A> propriedade para criar um divisor de ajuste que se move em incrementos maiores que 1 pixel.

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies that the vertical splitter moves in 10-pixel increments.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir especifica que o separador vertical se move em incrementos de 10 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: Outras propriedades básicas de uma divisão vertical também são mostradas.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than one.
trans-unit.target: O valor é menor que um.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the splitter control is moved.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle de divisão é movido.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving> event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style when you move the splitter.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte código de exemplo gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving> evento, como neste exemplo, uma alteração para o estilo do cursor quando você move o divisor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> event is raised when you stop moving the splitter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> evento é gerado quando você parar de se mover o divisor.

trans-unit.source: This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default.
trans-unit.target: Isso é como neste exemplo, o estilo de cursor, revertendo para o padrão.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the splitter control is in the process of moving.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle de divisão está se movendo.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the user moves the splitter control.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre somente quando o usuário move o controle de separador.

trans-unit.source: It does not occur when you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Ele não ocorre quando você altera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> programaticamente, o valor de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving> event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style when you move the splitter.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte código de exemplo gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving> evento, como neste exemplo, uma alteração para o estilo do cursor quando você move o divisor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> event is raised when you stop moving the splitter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> evento é gerado quando você parar de se mover o divisor.

trans-unit.source: This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default.
trans-unit.target: Isso é como neste exemplo, o estilo de cursor, revertendo para o padrão.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the splitter relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e a localização do divisor relativo a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the size and location of the splitter relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que especifica o tamanho e a localização do separador relativo a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> to get the width and height of the splitter relative to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> para obter a largura e altura do divisor relativo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyUp%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseUp%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A> event handlers draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> to show the current position of the splitter while it is moving.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyUp%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseUp%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A> manipuladores de eventos desenhar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> para mostrar a posição atual do separador, enquanto se move.

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> values vary depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O significado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> valores podem variar de acordo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The output of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> is in the format `{X, Y, Width, Height}`.
trans-unit.target: A saída de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> está no formato `{X, Y, Width, Height}`.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the meaning of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> values for vertical and horizontal splitters.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra o significado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> valores para divisores verticais e horizontais.

trans-unit.source: Dimension
trans-unit.target: Dimensão

trans-unit.source: Vertical Splitter
trans-unit.target: Divisão vertical

trans-unit.source: Horizontal Splitter
trans-unit.target: Divisão horizontal

trans-unit.source: X
trans-unit.target: X

trans-unit.source: The distance in pixels of the splitter from the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: A distância em pixels do separador da borda esquerda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: This value is always 0 for a horizontal splitter, indicating that the splitter is flush with the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é sempre 0 para um separador horizontal, indicando que o separador é alinhado com a borda esquerda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: Y
trans-unit.target: S

trans-unit.source: This value is always 0 for a vertical splitter, indicating that the splitter is flush with the top edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é sempre 0 para uma divisão vertical, indicando que o separador é alinhado com a borda superior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: The distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: A distância em pixels do separador da borda superior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: Width
trans-unit.target: Largura

trans-unit.source: The width of the splitter.
trans-unit.target: A largura do divisor.

trans-unit.source: The height of the splitter, which is equivalent to the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control.
trans-unit.target: A altura do divisor, que é equivalente à altura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> controle.

trans-unit.source: Height
trans-unit.target: Altura

trans-unit.source: The height of the splitter, which is equivalent to the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control.
trans-unit.target: A altura do divisor, que é equivalente à altura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> controle.

trans-unit.source: The width of the splitter.
trans-unit.target: A largura do divisor.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the splitter in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura do divisor em pixels.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the width of the splitter, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> que representa a largura do divisor em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The default is four pixels.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é quatro pixels.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterWidth%2A> property to change the width of the splitter itself, not the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterWidth%2A> propriedade para alterar a largura do divisor em si, não o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example specifies that the initial width of the vertical splitter is 6 pixels (the default).
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir especifica que a largura inicial do separador vertical é 6 pixels (o padrão).

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: Outras propriedades básicas de uma divisão vertical também são mostradas.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The value is less than one or is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: O valor é menor que um ou é incompatível com a orientação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to the splitter using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o usuário pode focalizar o divisor usando a tecla TAB.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can give the focus to the splitter using the TAB key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o usuário pode fornecer o foco para o separador usando a tecla TAB; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order of the form.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário pressiona a tecla TAB, o foco de entrada é definido para o próximo controle na ordem de tabulação do formulário.

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A> to `true` to give input focus to a splitter so that it can be moved with the arrow keys as well as with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A> para `true` para fornecer o foco de entrada a um divisor para que ela pode ser movida com as teclas de direção, bem como com o mouse.

trans-unit.source: Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A> to `false` excludes the splitter and any of the controls that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> from the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: A partir de [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], configuração <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A> para `false` exclui o divisor e qualquer um dos controles que estão contidos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> da coleção de controles na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to get focus by using the TAB key, create a control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Para ativar os controles receber o foco usando a tecla TAB, criar um controle que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: Create a new property named `TabStop` and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma nova propriedade chamada `TabStop` e substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como fazer isso.

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode manipular a ordem de tabulação, definindo o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: A string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> do Windows a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Todas as mensagens são enviadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> método após ser filtrado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> método corresponde exatamente ao Windows `WindowProc` função.

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function in the Platform SDK documentation at http://msdn.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o processamento de mensagens do Windows, consulte o `WindowProc` função na documentação do SDK da plataforma em http://msdn.microsoft.com.

trans-unit.source: for inheriting classes to call unmanaged code or for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: de herança de classes para chamar código não gerenciado ou para o chamador imediato chamar código não gerenciado.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Inheriting controls should call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method to process any messages that they do not handle.
trans-unit.target: Controles de herança deve chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> método para processar as mensagens que não lidar com eles.
